name: Basics in Bread
description:
Learn how to make easy but delicious breads & understand the basic fundamentals of bread making, from selecting the right flour to proofing and baking of bread. This workshop is perfect for someone with very little or no experience in baking. These varieties of breads are great options for your day-to-day baking.
• Soft rolls
• Ladi Pav
• Sandwich Loaf
• Burger Bun
• Grissini

name: High Tea Bakes (LBS)
description:
Prepare a delectable banana cake for your high tea party, ensuring it is moist and flavorful. Master the art of crafting buttery flaky scones and melt-in-your-mouth cheese cookies that harmoniously blend savory and indulgent elements.
• Banana cake
• Scones with Mixed berry jam
• Cheese cookie

name: Baked Desserts
description:
Learn recipes and techniques to achieve silky custards & decadent puddings, all baked to the most perfect texture every single time. You’ll also be making the classic cheesecake, and an ooey-gooey crowd pleaser, the choco lava cake!
• Classic New York Cheesecake
• Crème Caramel
• Bread & Butter Pudding
• Choco Lava Cake
• Crème Brûlée

name: Truffles & Bars (LBS)
description:
Master the art of confectionery creation, crafting delectable treats that are ideal for gifting, parties, or personal indulgence. Learn skills in the techniques of chocolate making, and elevate your confectionery creations for your next celebration.
• Dark chocolate truffle
• Mango & Coconut Truffle
• Inclusion Bar

name: Daily Breads (LBS)
description: Learn the art of making the most popular breads for daily use: an incredible sandwich loaf, and rich soft buns.

name: Basics in Chocolate
description:
Who doesn’t love a piece of chocolate? Learn the science & techniques of ‘tempering’ couverture chocolate to attain the shiniest of ‘bonbons’, decadent truffles & delicious ganache fillings.
• Truffles (3 types)
• Bonbons (4 types)

name: Savoury Bites (LBS)
description:
Craft a delightful Italian calzone, a flavorful Latin American chicken empanada, and a rustic French galette with ratatouille filling.
• Calzone with Cherry tomato filling
• Empanada with Chicken filling
• Galette with Ratatouille filling

name: World Breads
description:
Travel around the world on the bread-plane! Learn the techniques to make a variety of bread from different countries! Stepping up your bread game by making baguettes and focaccia! Understand how to make and use pre-ferments to improve the flavor and texture of your breads.
• Baguette
• Focaccia
• Whole Wheat Orange Loaf
• Cinnabon
• Korean Garlic Bread

name: Celebration Cakes
description:
A definite way to celebrate any occasion with these creative cakes – for chocolate, tropical & fruit lovers. Learn techniques of making, baking & layering cakes, getting a beautiful finish along with a handful of elements to play around with, flavor compositions & much more!
• Chocolate cake
• Cocoa nib syrup
• Corn flakes crunch
• Chocolate ganache cream
• Dark ganache
• Genoise sponge
• Sugar syrup
• Pineapple confit
• Coconut ganache cream
• Lemon Italian meringue buttercream
• Cocoa butter spray
• Spiced Carrot Cake
• Caramelised white chocolate cheese
• Walnut crumble

name: Mastering Macarons
description:
Crack the code to make perfect macarons, be it the French or Italian way! Learn the method of making the perfect macaron mix along with the piping and baking techniques! Also learn to make easy, fun and delicious filling to take your macarons to the next level.
• French macarons with 4 varieties of fillings
• Italian macarons with 4 varieties of fillings

name: Sweet Tarts & Pies
description:
With this worksop, dive into the details of creating delicious tarts and pies. Learn the techniques to perfect your ‘sablée’ dough, lining of the shells and tricks to making a lattice top!
• Banana Caramel Hazelnut Tart
• Dark Chocolate & Berry Tart
• Apple Ginger Cinnamon Pie
• Pecan Pie

name: Cupcakes, Cookies & Muffins
description:
A perfectly frosted cupcake could fix all our problems! This workshop will take you through all the recipes and techniques to make decadent cupcakes, creamy frostings, fudgy cookies and more. Understand how to create the best cookie doughs and muffin batters that give you the best texture.
• Chocolate Cupcake
• Red Velvet Cupcake
• Vanilla Caramel Cupcake
• Apple Oats Muffin
• Double Chocolate Chip Cookie
• Oatmeal Cranberry Cookie
• Lemon Crinkle Cookie

name: Breakfast Pastries
description:
Learn the art of lamination & beauty of having layers of butter & dough coming together to form the best version of a flakey, buttery & scrumptious pastry with a variety of fillings & looks, taking it up a notch!
• Classic Croissant
• Chocolate Croissant
• Almond Croissant
• Almond Marzipan
• Cinnamon Roll (Cinnamon Roll Mix)
• Fruit Danish
• Almond Cream & Pastry Cream
